ModMetaData.name: PRF-More Machines (v1.4)
ModMetaData.author: Daemon976
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds some additional machines to Project RimFactory Revived (version 2.50+) that are direct upgrades to core workbenches, plus a few mod bonus machines.
Adds:
Drug Synthesizer - A fully automated system capable of synthesizing anything the drug lab can create.
CNC Machining System - A fully automated upgrade from the manual Machining Table.
CNC Fabrication System - A fully automated advanced fabrication system designed for mass-production.
Textile Factory - Tired of slaving over a hot sewing machine? Build this and let it do all the tailoring for you!
Lumber Mill (Req. Expanded Woodworking) - Look Ma, no splinters! Let this device process all your wood for you.
Plasma Furnace - A variant of the PRF-Materials Plasma Furnace that doesn't require PRF-Materials
Materials Refinery - A variant of the PRF-Materials Materials Refinery that doesn't require PRF-Materials
Stone Fabricator - A variant of the PRF-Materials Stone Fabricator that doesn't require PRF-Materials
Archotech Assembler - (Req. More Archotech Garbage) An automated factory created by slapping a lot of Archotech Fragments onto a PRF machine base which miraculously creates a working factory.
Includes Helixien and Chemfuel powered variants of some machines if you have VHGE and/or VHCE.
